S3_Upload_Failed.Message: S3 upload failed. The object could not be uploaded to the bucket. Verify object path and upload permissions.

S3_Client_Operation_Failed.Message: S3 client operation failed. AWS client returned an error. Check credentials, bucket policy, and API response.

Storage_Initialization_Failed.Message: Storage initialization failed. Unable to initialize amazonStorage configuration or required resources.

Bulk_Download_Failed.Message: Bulk download failed. One or more files could not be downloaded from S3. Check file availability and bucket permissions.

File_Download_Failed.Message: File download failed. The target object could not be retrieved from S3. Verify object key and access policy.

Bulk_Download_Local_Path_Failed.Message: Bulk download to local path failed. A file could not be written or downloaded to the specified location.

Download_As_Array_Failed.Message: Download-as-array operation failed. The requested object array could not be fetched from S3.

List_Files_Failed.Message: Unable to list files. S3 object listing failed for the requested prefix. Check prefix and S3 permissions.

File_Existence_Check_Failed.Message: File existence check failed. Unable to verify whether the S3 object exists. Review bucket access and network.

Blob_Service_Operation_Failed.Message: Blob service operation failed. A storage action to blob client could not be completed. Inspect blob endpoint and credentials.

File_Not_Found.Message: Required file not found at the provided path.

Operation_Not_Permitted.Message: Operation not permitted. Validate access control or process privileges.

HTTP_Request_Failed.Message: HTTP request failed. Remote endpoint returned an error response. Check URL, credentials, or API availability.

Network_Request_Failed.Message: Network request failed. Unable to reach the service. Verify network connectivity and endpoint configuration.

Operation_Timeout.Message: Operation exceeded allowed time. Verify performance and network latency.

JSON_Decode_Error.Message: Invalid or unparseable input format encountered during JSON processing.

Unicode_Decode_Error.Message: Character encoding error encountered. Unable to decode bytes with specified encoding. Verify input encoding.

Unicode_Encode_Error.Message: Character encoding conversion failed. Unable to encode string to target encoding.

Unpickling_Error.Message: Deserialization failed. Unable to unpickle object. Verify pickle protocol and data integrity.

YAML_Error.Message: YAML parsing failed. Invalid YAML syntax or structure encountered. Review YAML formatting.

CSV_Error.Message: CSV processing error. Unable to parse or process CSV data. Check delimiter and format.

XML_Parse_Error.Message: XML parsing failed. Invalid XML structure or syntax encountered. Validate XML document.

Python_Processing_Error.Message: An unexpected error occurred in the processing service: {traceback error message}

Invalid_Value.Message: Invalid value encountered during processing. Input data does not meet expected format or range requirements.

Type_Mismatch.Message: Type mismatch in processing operation. Expected type differs from provided type. Verify data types and conversions.

Key_Not_Found.Message: Required key not found in data structure. Missing expected field in dictionary or configuration.

Index_Out_Of_Range.Message: Index out of range during data access. Array or list index exceeds available elements.

Attribute_Access_Failed.Message: Attribute access failed. The requested object attribute does not exist or is inaccessible.

Memory_Error.Message: Insufficient memory to complete operation. Processing requires more memory than available. Consider batch processing or optimization.

Numerical_Overflow.Message: Numerical overflow encountered. Calculation result exceeds maximum representable value.

Runtime_Error.Message: Runtime processing error occurred. An unexpected state or condition was encountered during execution.

Recursion_Error.Message: Maximum recursion depth exceeded. Operation may contain infinite recursion or requires increased recursion limit.

Iterator_Exhausted.Message: Iterator exhausted unexpectedly. Iteration operation terminated before expected completion.

Assertion_Failed.Message: Assertion failed during processing. Internal validation check did not pass. Review processing logic.

Import_Failed.Message: Required module import failed. Dependency is missing or incorrectly configured. Verify installed packages.

Module_Not_Found.Message: Required module not found. Python module or package is not installed. Check dependencies and environment.

Feature_Not_Implemented.Message: Feature not implemented. The requested operation is not yet supported.

System_Error.Message: Internal system error encountered. Python interpreter reported an internal issue.

Buffer_Error.Message: Buffer operation failed. Unable to perform buffer-related operation.

End_Of_File.Message: Unexpected end of file reached. Input stream ended prematurely during read operation.

Lookup_Error.Message: Lookup operation failed. Unable to find requested item in collection or mapping.

User_Interrupted.Message: Processing interrupted by user. Operation was manually cancelled.

System_Exit.Message: System exit requested. Processing terminated with exit signal.

Generator_Exit.Message: Generator closed unexpectedly. Generator function terminated before completion.

Reference_Error.Message: Weak reference error. Referenced object no longer exists or has been garbage collected.

Division_By_Zero.Message: Invalid arithmetic operation encountered during processing.

Floating_Point_Error.Message: Floating-point operation failed. Invalid mathematical operation on floating-point numbers.

Arithmetic_Error.Message: Arithmetic operation error. General mathematical calculation failure encountered.

Service_Initialization_Failed.Message: Service initialization failed. Validate configuration and startup dependencies.

Threading_Error.Message: Threading operation failed. Error in thread creation or management. Review concurrency implementation.

Multiprocessing_Error.Message: Multiprocessing operation failed. Error in process creation or inter-process communication.

Validation_Failed.Message: Data validation failed. Input does not conform to required schema or constraints.

OS_Error.Message: Operating system error occurred. System-level operation failed. Check system resources and permissions.

IO_Error.Message: Input/output operation failed. Unable to read from or write to resource. Verify file handles and paths.

Internal_Error_Handled.Message: Error was handled internally. Add warning log entry for observability.
